lines.text: let maxn be a constant integer with maxn = 3e5 + 5
let n , a , b , c be integers
let t be a integer with t = minimum of a and b
let m be a integer with m = minimum of t and c
if n is equal to 1 , return 0 , print 0 and newline
if n is equal to 2 , return 0 , print t and newline
lines.code: if ( n == 2 ) return cout << t << endl , 0 ;

lines.text: print t + ( n - 2 ) * m and newline
